##  {#profile-about data-menu-title="What is the Profile?"}

[**Background** \| What is the Profile?]{.slide-header}

<br> <br> <br> <br> [The ASTHO Profile of State and Territorial Public Health is a longitudinal census that began in 2007 and is fielded every three years to state and territorial health agencies with funding from CDC and RWJF.]{.text} <br> <br> <br> <br>

##  {#profile-measurements-ftes data-menu-title="FTEs"}

[**Background** \| How Do We Measure Workforce?]{.slide-header}

<br> <br>


::::{.columns}
:::{.column width="40%"}
![](images/ftes.png){fig-alt="Text: FTEs. Image: Icon of three people with the number two underneath. Two people represent .5FTE and one represents 1.0FTE. .5FTE is vacant." width=38% .absolute left=-15px top=165px} 
:::
:::{.column width="55%"}
<br><br><br>
[**The number of filled or vacant full-time equivalent positions (different from workers and positions)**.]{.text-sm} [<br><br> FTEs can include filled FTEs and vacant FTEs, which is a way to describe workforce capacity.]{.text-xsm}
:::
:::{.column width="5%"}
:::
::::



##  {#profile-measurements-positions data-menu-title="Positions"}

[**Background** \| How Do We Measure Workforce?]{.slide-header}

<br> <br> <br>

::::{.columns}
:::{.column width="3%"}
:::
:::{.column width="34%"}
![](images/positions.png){fig-alt="Text: Positions. Image: Icon of two papers, one with a person inside (filled position) and one without a person inside (vacant)." width=31.25% .absolute left=41px top=200px} 
:::
:::{.column width="3%"}
:::

:::{.column width="55%"}
<br> <br>
[**The number of actual positions (filled or vacant) within the agency/department.**]{.text-sm} [<br><br>One position may equal one FTE, but it may not. Two half-time positions, for example, equals one FTE.]{.text-xsm}
:::
:::{.column width="5%"}
:::
::::



##  {#profile-measurements-employees data-menu-title="Employees"}

[**Background** \| How Do We Measure Workforce?]{.slide-header}

<br> <br> <br>

::::{.columns}
:::{.column width="6%"}
:::
:::{.column width="27%"}
![](images/employees.png){fig-alt="Text: employees. Image: Icon of two people with the number two underneath" width=25% .absolute left=80px top=200px} 
:::
:::{.column width="7%"}
:::
:::{.column width="55%"}
<br><br>
[**The number of people working at the agency (also called a head count)**.]{.text-sm} [<br><br>One full-time employee (1FTE) might work in two positions, both at .5FTE.]{.text-xsm}
:::
:::{.column width="5%"}
:::
::::
